group.note0: Bike: Hamilton Rail Trail Loop Moving: 01:15, Elapsed: 01:25 So nice to get out on the bike! Mid 10's weather. Right shoulder lots of pain. Not so fit right now. Up Hamilton Rail Trail [20:31]
Walk: Bruce Trail and Tea with Marcus and Shannon Distance: 2.59 km; Duration: 00:37 Met Marcus and Shannon for a short walk on the Bruce Trail, followed by tea/coffee. Walked 5 km.
